name: Celebrity Focus
overview: Celebrity Focus creates marriages between famous people and famous brands. The mission of the agency is to provide professional execution of all phases the the process, creation and management of spokesperson relationships. The firm has managed more than 3,000 corporate/talent alliances during the past 24 years. CF has represented many of the most visible global brands, including consumer labels like Coke, Pepsi, Mercedes Benz, Ford, Frito Lay and Kellogg’s, along with high profile medical and pharmaceutical clients such as Astra Zeneca, Abbott Labs, Shering Plough, Takeda, GSK and more. The firm is led by founder and CEO Ric Bachrach.
